abilities.name: Elemental Empowerment
info: Anna's Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to inflict her target with a Burn, Shock, Wound, or Freeze that deals 3% damage per second, for 6 seconds.
When Anna uses a Heavy Attack, she gains a 5% Attack Buff for each Burn, Shock, Wound, or Freeze on enemies that lasts for 15 seconds. (Max Stacks: 20)
While holding a Heavy Attack, Anna cannot be Knocked Back by enemy Heavy Attacks and gains a 30% Defense Buff.

abilities.name: Elemental Surge
info: Anna Knocks Back all enemies in a circle around her, then deals 400% damage to each enemy hit.
Anna has a 60% chance per type to inflict each enemy hit with a Burn, Shock, Wound, or Freeze dealing 6% damage per second, for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Relay Strength
info: Anna Resists 50% of all Burn, Shock, Wound, and Freeze damage. Each time Anna is inflicted with one of these effects, Anna's own damage of that type is increased by an additional 1%, up to 5%.

talents.name: Sword of Arendelle
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Shield of Arendelle
talents.info: Grants +20% Defense at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Lasting Guard Stance
talents.info: Once per Heavy hold if hit by an enemy, Anna has a 70% chance to gain an Indestructible Buff that lasts for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Elemental Ward
talents.info: Anna’s Basic, Heavy, and Special Ability attacks deal an additional 100% damage to Titanborn. Anna Resists 30% of all Titanborn damage.

talents.name: Controlled Strikes
talents.info: Anna's chance to inflict Damaging Debuffs with her Core Ability is increased by an additional 10%. The Attack Buff Anna gains from her Core Ability is increased by an additional 5%.

talents.name: Reinforced Resilience
talents.info: Anna gains 6% Armor when she's inflicted with Burn, Shock, Wound, or Freeze. If Anna's target is Immune to those effects when she inflicts them, she also gains Armor.
